#summary Information about the prototype.

= Compiling instructions =

  * cd code/2apl_platform/environments
  * javac -classpath "../apapl.jar:." cardtable/*.java
  * jar cvf cardtable.jar cardtable/*.class

= Running instructions =

  * cd code/2apl_platform
  * java -jar apapl.jar
  * Load from menu and select briscola_chiamata/briscola_chiamata.mas
